Text: Final CP Name ChangeMerger List is the final list of counterparty name change and mergers for The changes will be made in the Global Counterparty system as follows Name Changes The current Legal name and ERMS Shortname will be overlayed on Monday in the afternoon We want to update the system before bid week begins on Tuesday If anyone has a problem with the ERMS shortnames being changed on Monday please notify us immediately Mergers Business changes The old record will be inactivated on Marilyn Colbert Cheryl Johnson

Name ChangeMerger Listing for is the preliminary spreadsheet for July There will definitely be another listing distributed no later than this Friday For some reason there has been an unusual number of notices issued and we are working diligently to get the documents lined up Updates to records in GCP for counterparty name changes The legal name field will be updated Monday afternoon The ERMS Shortnames will be changed on Tuesday afternoon

Final Name ChangeMergers Spreadsheet the name changes the legal names and ERMS SN have been updated on GCP I did receive the Kinder Morgan Inc merger document so was able to take care of that this time around Note in particular my comments regarding the Kinder Morgan and EniChem Americas Inc merger and name changes Call if there are questions

Initial CP Name ChangeMerger is the initial mergername change notice for March I will update the counterparty records with the new legal names tomorrow unless I hear from someone that this is an issue Copies of the documents will be sent out this afternoon I do have additional information to send out later this month If there are any questions please give us call Thanks Marilyn Colbert Mary Botello

CP Name ChangeMerger List for is the final list for February for counterparty name changes and mergers Name Overlay Only The counterparty name will be overlaid with the new name on Tuesday afternoon To be Inactivated Records to be inactivated will be done If this is an issue for anyone please call me right away to discuss All documentation will be copied and forwarded as usual Thanks MC

Re GCP Training For Swaps Paralegals Cc I would like to get a vote on which date would work best for the training class in April We have a conference room where a PC cart would work nicely for us The monitor is a large screen for easy viewing You might want to select dates in case your first choice is taken Which of these dates works best April Mon Wed Fri Also would AM PM be enough time Lunch will be provided I have approved all the security forms received so far so you should have view access to GCP in plenty of time Look forward to hearing from you Marilyn MARY COOK PM To Marilyn CT cc Subject GCP Training For Swaps Paralegals Below is a list of names for the training we discussed today to be set for the nd week in April Thanks again for today and in advance for the training session Stephanie Panus Samantha Boyd Susan Bailey Tana Jones Mary Cook Also please have Bill H call me regarding seek and find services for our group Cordially Mary Cook Enron North America Corp Smith th Floor Legal Houston Texas phone fax

Re GCP Training For Swaps Paralegals Cc Stephanie It doesnt have to be that week it can be the week before or the third week I was just going by someones comment about the second week of April If works that would be OK too I will be out of the office from Talk amongst yourselves and keep me posted Thanks for your quick response Marilyn PS Would you be the point person for your group so I dont bombard everyone with emails Stephanie NRON PM To Marilyn CT cc Subject Re GCP Training For Swaps Paralegals Marilyn I will be out that week except for Friday but I know that Susan Bailey will be out that Friday If you need to schedule it that week I can always get with Susan Samantha or Tana to later to review the information Thanks Stephanie Marilyn CT PM To Mary CT cc Stephanie nron Samantha nron Susan CT Tana CT Bill D ct Bernice CT Subject Re GCP Training For Swaps Paralegals Ladies I would like to get a vote on which date would work best for the training class in April We have a conference room where a PC cart would work nicely for us The monitor is a large screen for easy viewing You might want to select dates in case your first choice is taken Which of these dates works best April Mon Wed Fri Also would AM PM be enough time Lunch will be provided I have approved all the security forms received so far so you should have view access to GCP in plenty of time Look forward to hearing from you Marilyn MARY COOK PM To Marilyn CT cc Subject GCP Training For Swaps Paralegals Below is a list of names for the training we discussed today to be set for the nd week in April Thanks again for today and in advance for the training session Stephanie Panus Samantha Boyd Susan Bailey Tana Jones Mary Cook Also please have Bill H call me regarding seek and find services for our group Cordially Mary Cook Enron North America Corp Smith th Floor Legal Houston Texas phone fax

Counterparty Name Conventions Cc with the suggestions provided by Mary Cook in our Legal Dept we have come to an agreement in regard to the naming conventions for divisions and trade names For both divisions and dbatrade names the counterparty name will be formatted to lead with the subentity name followed by the parent legal name ie division name division of parent legal name or trade name a dba of parent legal name Ex Duke Power a division of Duke Energy Corporation This layout will make it easier to choose the correct counterparty name and avoid the misconception of duplicate records Also the legal requirements will be met Please notify me by Friday June th if there are any issues with this format Otherwise the GCP group will commence using this proposed layout on current and future requests Cleanup of existing records in GCP and Contracts will be accessed In cases where the requested name could exceed the character length maximum there will need to be an evaluation If there are any questions please contact me Thank you Marilyn

is the spreadsheet for counterparty name changes and mergersbusiness changes for April If you have any questions please call me at NOTE For the name changes the legal name and ERMS SN will be will be updated on Tuesday Thanks Marilyn

CP Name ChangeMerger List for is the first edition for name changesmergers for May NOTE We will overlay the legal names on Tuesday in the afternoon The ERMS Shortname will be overlaid on Wednesday in the afternoon Please call Mary or myself if this presents a problem for anyone Mary Botello Marilyn Colbert

Updated Name ChangeMerger List is the latest and greatest for Please note the comments about KN Energy Inc and Kinder Morgan Name Changes Legal Names will be updated on Friday in the afternoon ERMS SN ERMS SN will be updated on Monday in the afternoon There is quite a bit of info for this month If I have anything else I will try to get it out by Monday Call if there are any questions Marilyn

CP Name ChangeMergers for June Finalshould be the last listing for this month unless something critical comes up For the records with names changes only I will update Global Counterparty with the new names tomorrow after PM I will also change the ERMS SN at the same time If anyone has any issues with these updates please contact me Friday morning Thanks Marilyn

Re EOL Credit GCP Responses Cc Power Services Company merged into Calpine Energy Services LP eff with the survivor being Calpine Energy Services LP Copies of the documents were hand carried to legal by Anthony Campos on I believe he gave them to Lisa I am not certain why you have not received them yet Please check with her and then let me know if there is anything more I can do Thanks MC From Tana Jones on AM To Cheryl nron Marilyn CT cc Subject Re EOL Credit GCP Responses So back to my original question is this a name change Forwarded by Tana JonesHOUECT on AM Adnan NRON AM To Cheryl nron cc Tana CT Subject Re EOL Credit GCP Responses Please contact Cheryl or Marilyn Colbert for any name change mergers acquisition documents Forwarded by Adnan PatelCorpEnron on AM From Tana CT on AM To Adnan NRON cc Subject Re EOL Credit GCP Responses Is Calpine Energy Services LP a name change from Calpine Power Services Company If it is I need to see the name change because I have a financial master executed under Calpine Power Services Can you fax it to me at Thanks Adnan NRON AM To Karen CT cc Tana CT Samuel CT Mark CT Brant CT Debbie R CT David CT Lesli CT Cynthia NRON Mary G CT Enron Europe Global Contracts and CT Enron Europe Global CT Stephanie CT Bradley CT Stacey CT Tom CT Claudia CT William S CT Lisa CT Juana nron Jana nron Trang CT Paul CT Sonya CT Lee CT Tim CT Subject Re EOL Credit GCP Responses Attached is the list of GCP Signoffs on EOL Approvals for marked in RED Adnan Bradley CT AM To Karen CT Tana CT Samuel CT Mark CT Brant CT Debbie R CT David CT Lesli CT Cynthia NRON Mary G CT Enron Europe Global Contracts and Facilities Enron Europe Global CounterParty Stephanie CT Bradley CT Stacey CT Tom CT Adnan NRON Claudia CT William S CT Lisa CT Juana nron Jana nron Trang CT Paul CT Sonya CT Lee CT Tim CT cc Subject EOL Credit Responses Regards bd
